sentences.english: My favorite beer is from a microbrewery.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡的啤酒是一家小釀酒廠出產的。

sentences.english: He searched for a flower shop and a local winery and found none.
sentences.chinese: 他想找家花店和當地的葡萄酒廠，但一無所獲。

sentences.english: The works at the winery led to the re-thinking of the external space.
sentences.chinese: 釀酒廠的工作引發了對內部空間的重新思考。

sentences.english: Next was a tour and tasting session at a winery making sickeningly sweet lychee wine.
sentences.chinese: 接下來的環節是到一家荔枝酒廠參觀和品嚐。

sentences.english: The utilization of brewery sludge not only helps clean the environment, but also lowers the cost of alga cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 利用啤酒廠污泥既淨化環境，又降低藻類養殖成本。

sentences.english: There are also many microbreweries, two of which have their own restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 當地還有許多小型釀酒廠，其中兩家擁有附屬餐廳。

sentences.english: After the agaves are crushed at the distillery, why are they loaded into a hornos?
sentences.chinese: 當龍舌蘭在酒廠被壓榨後，爲什麼要被放進烤爐中呢？

sentences.english: The winery, however, is the other side of the mountain near Beirut.
sentences.chinese: 然而，釀酒廠卻位於靠近貝魯特的山的另一邊。

sentences.english: Our company is best breweries and Mr cooperation jointly established a set of production.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是和麥佳啤酒廠合作共同成立的一家集生產。

sentences.english: I’ve yet to find a town in America without a local microbrewery.
sentences.chinese: 至今我還沒發現美國哪個地方沒有自己的釀酒廠。

sentences.english: The brewery had 25 heavy horses delivering beer in London.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒廠有25匹高頭大馬在倫敦城中運送啤酒。

sentences.english: A tractor sprays the vines on the Oremus estate.
sentences.chinese: 一輛拖拉機給Oremus酒廠的葡萄樹噴灌。

sentences.english: The workers are also picketing at two other breweries in protest of proposed workforce cuts. (Photo by Mark Renders/Getty Images)
sentences.chinese: 在另外兩個啤酒廠也有工人抗議裁員。

sentences.english: Today, Napa Valley is home to almost 400 wineries.
sentences.chinese: 今天，是納帕谷的近400家酒廠。

sentences.english: Then he took out a business card for his family’s private baijiu distillery.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他拿出了他傢俬人酒廠的名片。

sentences.english: A method of wastewater treatment is studied by using aluminum sulfate and polyacrylamide in wine Brewing.
sentences.chinese: 研究了硫酸鋁聚丙烯酰胺法處理釀酒廠廢水。

definition: to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
Kavalan, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan/old name of Yilan 宜蘭|宜兰 county, Taiwan/Kavalan, a brand of single malt whisky from Taiwan
to taste a small amount/to sample
to produce (by natural growth, or by manufacture, mining etc)/to yield/to turn out/produce/products
